name: phonebook
description: Simple phonebook REST API using Node.js and Express

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebook
scripts.deploy: cd ../../ && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook heroku main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Jon Ziefle
